data.text: “Uwiche goya makutu, gwa ulanga, nani ndolonga,
Malanguso ga heni nagalagale kota nhonya,
Mina ndolidamla itagwa lya Mkulu Nguluwi,
“Mkulu Nguluwi ndo Italawe lya kwamila,
Ila hemwe mwahela utumbilo kwa heye,
Mwangujeza ndaze kumditila ahyo Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mkumbuchile mazuwa gapulute,
Nguluwi yawele kuchanya hoyazipele isi zeng'ha lufufu lwao,
ila nakewichila wana wa Yakobo wawe wa heye, Mkulu Nguluwi,
“Nakawafika kuli isi igunuche,
Kota ikungule vyolilingulolela chimvulila chake,
Heye yuye Mkulu Nguluwi nakawalongoza
Nakamkwiniza hali honhu ha isi henuche,
Nakawapa mtindi na matombo ga migongolo
“Lelo Waisilaeli32:15 Waisilaeli Kwa Chiebulaniya, Yeshulunindo ulonzi wunji kwa Isilaeli. nawaneneha na kutowa teche,
Nawamdita yone fihi kwa milungu jawo,
Nawavilavila nhambiko vijeni, vyohaviwele Nguluwi, nawajilutila milungu johawajizelele ng'oo,
Hawakumbuchile Italawe lya kwamila liwapele ukomu,
“Mkulu Nguluwi nakayona mbuli ayo nakawaleka,
Nakalonga, ‘Ndovisa kumeho kwa heni,
Nawandita mbone fihi kwa chinhu chohachiwele nguluwi,
Ng'halazi ya heni yokwaka kota chiluli,
“ ‘Ndowika magazo menji ng'hatu kwa chiwalo cha hewo,
Woganda kwa nzala,
Ngondo yokwambuza kubagama kwinji kunze
Nandonga, “Nandawadumile ng'hatu
ila kwa chiwalo cha kidaya kwa wang'honyo wa hewo,
“Isilaeli ndo isi isowile nyhala,
Wone wahawele na luhala nawahavizelele lekachoni nawalemwela,
Munhu yumwe koweza ndaze kuwadumya wanhu elufu imwe,
Na wang'honyo wa hetwe nawakunda hazelu,
Mina mizabibu ja hewo ndo mizuchila ja Sodoma
Divai ya hewo ndo kota dunga ya mizoka,
“Ndaze ndahela nzila ya kuwagaza?
Kuhilula chibida ndo kwa chiwalo cha heni, heni ndolipiza,
Mkulu Nguluwi kowalewela wanhu wa heye
Aho ndo Mkulu Nguluwi hoyowauza wanhu wa heye,
Ja kohi ajo milungu ja hemwe jidile mafuta ga nhambiko,
“ ‘Mlole kota heni nda Nguluwi
Ndangugolola moko ga heni kilanga,
wone nole ipanga lyangu lilingupulika,
Misale ja heni ndojigaliza kwa danda,
“Hemwe isi msangalale na wanhu wa hemwe,
Musa nakoya hamwe na Yoshua, mwana wa Nuni, nawadekuliza ulonzi wa lwimbo alu, leka Waisilaeli weng'ha wauhuliche.
Musa loyasindile kuwalonjela wanhu wa Isilaeli ulonzi awu weng'ha,
nakawalonjela, “Muuwiche mnhumbula za hemwe ulonzi weng'ha wondilinguwapani lehano, leka muwalajize wana wa hemwe wawinze goya ulonzi weng'ha wa malajizo aga.
Mina malajizo aga hagawele ulonzi hela, ila ndo ukomu wa hemwe, kwa malajizo aga, mochikala kwa miyaka minji kuli isi yomlinguluta kuihola, kumwambu mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani.”
Zuwa lilyo, Mkulu Nguluwi nakamlonjela Musa,
“Ukwine chidunda achi cha Abalimu, chidunda cha Nebo kuli isi ya Moabu, chilingilola na muji wa Yeliko, ukailole isi ya Kanaani yondilinguwapa Waisilaeli waihole.
Hamba kobagama kuko kuchidunda kota mkulugo Aluni navyoyabagame kuli chidunda cha Holi,

kwa vila weng'ha weli nambena kitumbila kwa hemwe kwa heni hali Waisilaeli nalomuwele kuli mazi ga Meliba, habehi na muji wa Kadeshi, kuli kuchiwala cha Sini, na mlemwela kunditila heni kota nda yelile hali Waisilaeli.
Koyona isi iwele kumwando kwa hegwe, ila haukwinjila kuli isi ayo yondilinguwapa Waisilaeli.”
